name: On The Other Hand
description:
CONTENT WARNING: MILD GORE, BLOOD, UPSETTING IMAGERY

On The Other hand is a horror-puzzle game about reassembling your hand piece by piece after being trapped in a psychopath's sick game.

Retrieving your fingers won't be easy - each one is tied to a specific puzzle, and time is slowly running out with you only having 8 minutes to solve them before passing out from blood loss.

We hope you enjoy the game we made in 2 weeks for the Indie Horror Jam 2021!

Note

We're a team of students, so things are a little rough - the 2D puzzle doesn't have a solution and some sound effects are missing, but everything will be addressed in a post-jam version. We hope you enjoy the concept and rudimentary mechanics, if nothing else!

Credits

WestyDesign AKA Kieron West - Team Lead, Programmer & Level Designer

Scott Proctor - 3D Modeller

Lawton Miller - Concept Artist

Leon Ellington - Artist

Controls

W-A-S-D to move & Mouse to look around

E to interact with items that show a hand when you get close*

Mouse to move things in the 2D puzzle

*(Get a little closer if nothing happens!)
